resources.string: This device does not support bluetooth :(
Instructions: Simultaneously press the 1 and 2 buttons on your Wii remote, then tap the corresponding entry (highlighted in green) in the list below.
Instructions: Press the sync button on the back of your controller, then tap the corresponding entry in the list below.
What is your device\'s Blueooth MAC address?
To see your device\'s Bluetooth MAC address, open Android settings > About device
